title: E-textile capacitive electrodes: Fabric or thread: designing an E-textile cushion for sitting posture detection

abstract: This workshop will show how 3D printing with embedded fabric can be used for Cosplay & Fashion. These projects will inspire others to push the boundaries of how we use 3D printing.
